name: ebay_get_oauth_url
description: Generate an OAuth authorization URL for user token authentication. Use this to get higher API rate limits (10k-50k requests/day vs 1k with client credentials).

name: ebay_get_inventory_items
description: Retrieve all inventory items for the seller. Supports pagination and filtering.

arguments.name: limit
arguments.desc: The number of inventory items to return per page (max 100)

arguments.name: offset
arguments.desc: The number of items to skip before starting to return results

name: ebay_get_inventory_item
description: Get details of a specific inventory item by SKU.

arguments.name: sku
arguments.desc: The seller-defined SKU of the inventory item

name: ebay_create_or_replace_inventory_item
description: Create a new inventory item or replace an existing one. This is the first step in creating an eBay listing.

arguments.name: sku
arguments.desc: The seller-defined SKU for the inventory item

arguments.name: product
arguments.desc: Product details including title, description, aspects, images, etc.

arguments.name: availability
arguments.desc: Item availability including quantity and fulfillment options

name: ebay_get_offers
description: Retrieve all offers (published and unpublished listings) for the seller.

arguments.name: limit
arguments.desc: Maximum number of offers to return

name: ebay_create_offer
description: Create a new offer (listing) for an inventory item. The inventory item must exist before creating an offer.

arguments.name: sku
arguments.desc: SKU of the inventory item to create an offer for

arguments.name: pricingSummary
arguments.desc: Pricing details including price and currency

arguments.name: listingPolicies
arguments.desc: Policy IDs for fulfillment, payment, and return

name: ebay_publish_offer
description: Publish an offer to make it live on eBay as an active listing.

arguments.name: offerId
arguments.desc: The unique identifier of the offer to publish

name: ebay_get_orders
description: Retrieve seller orders with filtering and pagination. Essential for order fulfillment workflow.

arguments.name: filter
arguments.desc: Filter orders by creation date, status, etc.

arguments.name: limit
arguments.desc: Maximum number of orders to return

name: ebay_get_order
description: Get detailed information about a specific order.

name: ebay_create_shipping_fulfillment
description: Mark an order as shipped by providing tracking information.

arguments.name: lineItems
arguments.desc: Array of line item IDs being shipped

name: ebay_get_campaigns
description: Retrieve all Promoted Listings campaigns for the seller.

arguments.name: campaign_status
arguments.desc: Filter by campaign status (RUNNING, PAUSED, ENDED)

arguments.name: limit
arguments.desc: Maximum number of campaigns to return

name: ebay_create_campaign
description: Create a new Promoted Listings campaign to advertise items.

name: ebay_get_fulfillment_policies
description: Retrieve seller's fulfillment policies (shipping policies).

name: ebay_get_payment_policies
description: Retrieve seller's payment policies.

name: ebay_get_return_policies
description: Retrieve seller's return policies.

name: ebay_get_traffic_report
description: Get analytics on listing views, clicks, and impressions.

name: ebay_get_seller_standards_profile
description: Get the seller's performance metrics and standards status.

name: ebay_get_category_tree
description: Get the category tree for a specific eBay marketplace.

name: ebay_get_item_aspects_for_category
description: Get required and recommended item aspects (attributes) for a specific category.

name: ebay_search_category_suggestions
description: Get category suggestions based on a product query string.

name: ebay_create_inventory_location
description: Create a new inventory location (warehouse, store, etc.) for multi-location inventory.

name: ebay_bulk_migrate_listings
description: Migrate legacy listings to the inventory model in bulk.

arguments.name: requests
arguments.desc: Array of listing IDs to migrate
